report.title: App - Get NPMS+ Plots For User
report.description: List of plots of a given user ID. Used by Karolis to setup app. Report contains IDs hard-coded to live Warehouse.
report.query: SELECT distinct #columns# FROM groups g JOIN groups_users gu on gu.group_id=g.id AND gu.deleted=false JOIN groups_locations gl on gl.group_id=g.id and gl.deleted=false JOIN locations square on square.id = gl.location_id AND square.location_type_id = 18071 AND square.deleted=false JOIN locations plot on plot.parent_id = square.id AND plot.location_type_id in (18678,18679,18680) AND plot.deleted=false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms cache_ttPlotType on cache_ttPlotType.id = plot.location_type_id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values lav on lav.location_attribute_id=118 AND lav.location_id=plot.id LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_expert_mode_attr_val on plot_expert_mode_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_expert_mode_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 122 AND plot_expert_mode_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val on plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 143 AND plot_end_grid_ref_1_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val on plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 144 AND plot_end_grid_ref_2_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_south_west_corner_attr_val on plot_south_west_corner_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_south_west_corner_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 146 AND plot_south_west_corner_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_slope_attr_val on plot_slope_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_slope_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 31 AND plot_slope_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms plot_slope_ctt on plot_slope_ctt.id = plot_slope_attr_val.int_value AND plot_slope_ctt.termlist_id = 112 LEFT JOIN location_attribute_values plot_direction_attr_val on plot_direction_attr_val.location_id = plot.id AND plot_direction_attr_val.location_attribute_id = 30 AND plot_direction_attr_val.deleted = false LEFT JOIN cache_termlists_terms plot_direction_ctt on plot_direction_ctt.id = plot_direction_attr_val.int_value AND plot_direction_ctt.termlist_id = 113 #joins# WHERE g.website_id=106 AND g.group_type_id=18067 AND (g.id::text='#project_id#' OR '#project_id#'='') AND (gu.user_id::text='#warehouse_user_id#' OR '#warehouse_user_id#'='') AND g.deleted=false

column.name: plot_expert_mode
column.sql: CASE WHEN plot_expert_mode_attr_val.int_value = 1 THEN 'TRUE' ELSE 'FALSE' END
